name: Interface ForLoopTree
text:
A tree node for a basic 'for' loop statement.

 For example:
 
   for ( initializer ; condition ; update )
       statement
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface ForLoopTree
extends ConditionalLoopTree

methods.description: Returns the initializer expression of this 'for' statement.
Returns the condition expression of this 'for' statement.
Returns the update expression of this 'for' statement.
Returns the statement contained in this 'for' statement.
